about.title: About Us
about.text: MicroMyu is a forward-looking high-tech enterprise specializing in computer software and hardware, artificial intelligence, virtual reality (VR), augmented reality (AR), mixed reality (MR), the Internet of Things (IoT), and cloud computing. We are committed to providing global enterprises with cutting-edge digital solutions and intelligent services.

solutions.title: Core Solutions — Driving Business Transformation Through Technology
solutions.subtitle: MicroMyu deeply integrates AI, XR, and IoT with cloud computing to create scalable, customizable intelligent platforms and products. We help enterprises achieve operational intelligence, immersive experiences, and data-driven decision-making. We focus on results — reducing costs, improving efficiency, and creating new business models.
solutions.description1: End-to-end enterprise-grade AI capabilities: customized model training, real-time inference, automated data labeling, and model governance. Applicable to various scenarios such as supply chain forecasting, intelligent customer service, and visual quality inspection. Supports both on-premise and hybrid cloud deployments, balancing performance and compliance.
solutions.description2: Immersive interaction and digital twin: AR guidance, VR training, mixed-reality maintenance, and visualized digital twin platforms. Designed for product design, remote collaboration, and realistic simulation through scalable XR modules.
solutions.description3: A complete chain from sensors to edge computing: customized sensor integration, edge gateway development, low-power connectivity, and cloud-based device management. Enables real-time data collection, intelligent edge alerts, and remote maintenance.
solutions.description4: Building secure, elastic, and scalable cloud-native platforms: microservices, containerization, CI/CD, and multi-cloud orchestration. We provide fast delivery pipelines, data lakes, and governance strategies to help enterprises achieve flexibility and cost optimization without added complexity.
solutions.description5: Rapid customization: requirement evaluation → prototype → co-iteration → deployment and operations. MicroMyu delivers seamless integration across software customization, smart hardware design, and system implementation, ensuring every step from PoC to mass production is controllable and measurable.

industry.title: Industry Applications
industry.subtitle: MicroMyu brings cutting-edge technologies into key industries, driving efficiency, user experience, and sustainable growth. Each deployment is scenario-oriented, integrating AI, XR, IoT, and cloud computing to deliver measurable business results.
industry.description1: Through Industrial IoT and edge AI, we build real-time digital twins and predictive maintenance platforms for manufacturers, reducing unplanned downtime by over 40% and improving production efficiency by 30%.
industry.description2: In smart transportation, energy management, and public safety, MicroMyu deploys cloud-based sensing networks and multimodal data fusion engines to achieve traffic congestion prediction, energy optimization, and rapid incident response.
industry.description3: We integrate AI medical imaging, wearable IoT, and XR-based remote collaboration to enable rapid screening, teleconsultation, and rehabilitation training. This improves diagnostic efficiency and reduces healthcare costs.
industry.subtitle4: Omnichannel Experience Powered by Intelligent Perception
industry.description4: Combining computer vision and personalized recommendation engines, MicroMyu helps retailers achieve in-store behavior analytics, intelligent restocking, and immersive XR displays—boosting average order value and conversion rates.
industry.subtitle5: Intelligent Scheduling and Carbon Reduction in Practice
industry.description5: For energy enterprises, we offer distributed energy management and load forecasting solutions. By combining IoT sensing with cloud optimization algorithms, we enable precise scheduling and visualized carbon reduction reporting.
industry.description6: Scenario-Driven: Solutions designed from real business challenges. Scalability: Modular architecture adaptable to organizations of all sizes and complexity. Measurable Results: KPI-aligned delivery that is transparent and data-driven.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.mission: Our vision is to reshape the boundaries of future production and life through intelligent technology. MicroMyu is dedicated to seamlessly integrating AI, XR, IoT, and cloud capabilities to build scalable, low-energy, and auditable intelligent systems that enable enterprises to make efficient decisions and achieve sustainable growth.
vision.description1: We prioritize energy efficiency, data privacy, and social impact in our product design and deployment, promoting green computing and responsible AI practices.
vision.description2: Through standardized interfaces, transparent algorithms, and industry collaboration, we empower partners and developers to accelerate digital transformation across vertical industries.
vision.description3: We translate technological value into long-term social benefits, creating quantifiable outcomes in both business growth and environmental sustainability.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.sub: We value and protect your personal data and security

sections.p: We process personal data lawfully, fairly and transparently. This policy applies to our sites, products and services.

list: Account data: name, contact, company, etc.
Technical data: device, browser, IP, cookies/local storage
Usage data: access logs, actions, errors, performance metrics
Business data: data necessary to provide ITO/BPO/integration services
Provide, maintain and improve products and services
Support, troubleshooting, security audits and risk control
Other purposes with your consent (subscriptions, event notices)

sections.p: Used for sessions, preferences, analytics and security. You can manage/disable cookies in your browser; some features may be limited.
Shared only for legal compliance, contract performance, or with trusted vendors under proper safeguards.
We adopt safeguards for cross-border transfers and retain data under minimization and retention principles.
Encryption, access control, least privilege, auditing and backups to reduce risk.
We do not target minors or knowingly collect their data; we delete it if discovered.
